name: Windows Transliteration File
summary: An NLT file is a Windows system file used to map one language's writing system to another, in a process called transliteration. It contains text and binary data that associates characters used in one language with characters used in another. NLT files are found in the C:/​Windows/​Globalization/​ELS/​Transliteration directory.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
